mapper.select: select id, student_name as studentName, user_phone as userPhone, pattern as pattern, canal as canal, class_hour as classHour, school_name as schoolName, enroll_state as enrollState, course_hour as courseHour, course_name as courseName, is_delete as isDelete, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime from t_enroll_info where is_delete = 0 order by id desc limit #{dataNum}, #{limit};
select count(1) from t_enroll_info where is_delete = 0
mapper.insert: insert into t_enroll_info (student_name, user_phone, pattern, canal, class_hour, school_name, enroll_state, course_hour, course_name, create_time, update_time) values (#{studentName}, #{userPhone}, #{pattern}, #{canal}, #{classHour}, #{schoolName}, #{enrollState}, #{courseHour}, #{courseName}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
